summary: A young man must risk his life to save his fire-breathing friend from the unscrupulous owner of an amusement park.
cast: Courtland Mead|Janet Henfrey|Stuart Campbell|Andrew Keir|Lila Kaye|Alastair Mackenzie|Brittney Powell|John Calvin|Jim Dunk|Sue Douglas|John Woodvine|Marioara Stelian|Valentin Popescu|Cameron Stuart|Claudiu Istodor|Florin Busuioc|Richard Trask
title: Dragonworld
